languages.text: "Почему бы и не спасти несметные богатства для разнообразия? За скромный процент мы..." {n}Джай осекается под ледяным взглядом маршала.{/n} "...не работаем. Только безвозмездно. Во благо Империума!"

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Почему бы и не поспасать несметные богатства для разнообразия? За скромный процент мы..." {n}Джай осекается под ледяным взглядом маршала.{/n} "...не работаем. Только безвозмездно. Во благо Империума!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"
languages.original_text: "Почему бы и не спасти несметные богатства для разнообразия? За скромный процент мы..." {n}Джай осекается под ледяным взглядом маршала.{/n} "...не работаем. Только безвозмездно. Во благо Империума!"

traits.locale_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, as we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

"To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, as we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

"To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

"To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

"To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

"To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

languages.text: "Um unermessliche Reichtümer zu sparen, nur mal so zur Abwechslung? Warum nicht? Wenn Ihr uns einen bescheidenen Anteil des Fracht anbötet, wären wir ..." {n}Jae bemerkt den eisigen Blick des Marschalls.{/n} "... empört! Wir verlangen keinerlei Kompensation, den wir arbeiten ausschließlich für das Wohl des Imperiums!"
languages.original_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: "Um unermessliche Reichtümer zu sparen, nur mal so zur Abwechslung? Warum nicht? Wenn Ihr uns einen bescheidenen Anteil des Fracht anbötet, wären wir ..." {n}Jae bemerkt den eisigen Blick des Marschalls.{/n} "... empört! Wir verlangen keinerlei Kompensation, den wir arbeiten ausschließlich für das Wohl des Imperiums!"

languages.text: « Récupérer un immense trésor, ça nous changera de l'ordinaire, non ? Pourquoi pas ? Si vous nous proposiez une modeste part du butin, on serait... {n}Jae s'interrompt en croisant le regard glacial du maréchal.{/n} Tout simplement outragés ! Nous n'attendons aucune compensation, notre ultime récompense sera la satisfaction d'avoir agi pour le bien de l'Imperium ! »
languages.original_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: « Récupérer un immense trésor, ça nous changera de l'ordinaire, non ? Pourquoi pas ? Si vous nous proposiez une modeste part du butin, on serait... {n}Jae s'interrompt en croisant le regard glacial du maréchal.{/n} Tout simplement outragés ! Nous n'attendons aucune compensation, notre ultime récompense sera la satisfaction d'avoir agi pour le bien de l'Imperium ! »

languages.text: “既然是为了拯救不计其数的财宝，那稍微消遣一下，又有何不可呢？如果你愿意把其中一部分资源交给我们，那我们肯定会……”{n}婕伊突然注意到了索罗蒙冰冷的视线。{/n}“……义愤填膺！我们根本不需要任何报酬，因为我们所做的一切，都是为了帝国的利益！”
languages.original_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: “既然是为了拯救不计其数的财宝，那稍微消遣一下，又有何不可呢？如果你愿意把其中一部分资源交给我们，那我们肯定会……”{n}婕伊突然注意到了索罗蒙冰冷的视线。{/n}“……义愤填膺！我们根本不需要任何报酬，因为我们所做的一切，都是为了帝国的利益！”

languages.text: «¿Salvar un tesoro de proporciones inimaginables, por cambiar de aires? ¿Por qué no? Si nos ofreciera una modesta fracción del cargamento, estaríamos...». {n}Jae se percata de la mirada gélida del Mariscal.{/n} «... ¡Indignadísimos! ¡No necesitamos ningún tipo de compensación; actuamos únicamente por el bien del Imperium!».
languages.original_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Salvar un tesoro de proporciones inimaginables, por cambiar de aires? ¿Por qué no? Si nos ofreciera una modesta fracción del cargamento, estaríamos...». {n}Jae se percata de la mirada gélida del Mariscal.{/n} «... ¡Indignadísimos! ¡No necesitamos ningún tipo de compensación; actuamos únicamente por el bien del Imperium!».

languages.text: 「気分転換に想像を絶する宝の山を救うって？いいじゃない。積み荷からそれなりの分け前をくれるんなら…」{n}ジェイは将帥の冷たい視線を感じ取った。{/n}「…ムカつく！報酬なんてちっとも欲しくないわよ。アタシたちはただ帝国のために行動してるんだからね！」
languages.original_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: 「気分転換に想像を絶する宝の山を救うって？いいじゃない。積み荷からそれなりの分け前をくれるんなら…」{n}ジェイは将帥の冷たい視線を感じ取った。{/n}「…ムカつく！報酬なんてちっとも欲しくないわよ。アタシたちはただ帝国のために行動してるんだからね！」

languages.text: Hayal bile edilemeyecek bir hazineyi kurtarmak için, sırf değişiklik olsun diye mi? Neden olmasın? Eğer bize kargonun mütevazı bir kısmını teklif etseydin biz..." {n}Jae, Miralay'ın buz gibi bakışlarını yakalıyor.{/n} "Çok öfkelenirdik! Hiçbir tazminat talep etmiyoruz çünkü biz yalnızca İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için çalışıyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "To save an unimaginable treasure hoard, just as a change of pace? Why not? If you were to offer us a modest share of the cargo, we would be..." {n}Jae catches the Marshal's icy glare.{/n} "...outraged! We require no compensation at all, for we operate solely for the good of the Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: Hayal bile edilemeyecek bir hazineyi kurtarmak için, sadece bir değişiklik olsun diye mi? Neden olmasın? Eğer bize kargonun mütevazı bir kısmını teklif etseydin biz..." {n}Jae, Miralay'ın buz gibi bakışlarını yakalıyor.{/n} "Çok öfkelenirdik! Hiçbir tazminat talep etmiyoruz çünkü biz yalnızca İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için çalışıyoruz!"
